name: Dusk of Emulch
description:
Elmuch, the Demon King of Old, has returned to the world and defeated its protector. Now, he is not only threatening the last human city of Myrella, but the essence of humanity as you know it. In this fantasy tale, you must complete your objectives to stop the world from spiraling out of control. Time is ticking, champion. In each second that passes, Elmuch’s power grows further out of control.

How to play

  • WASD = Movement
  • Left Control or Left Shift = Roll
  • Mouse = Look around
  • Left mouse click = Attack
  • Space = Jump

Tip

When close to "Hilda" and you are without a quest, she will give you 1 quest after a few seconds.
